ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This class is a traditional Latin prose composition class with emphasis on stylistics. I would recommend this class to anyone who is interested in improving their Latin reading skills through composition.

I would only recommend it to another student if he or she had ample time in his or her schedule. I was taken aback by the amount of time necessary to complete the work, which seemed to increase as the semester went on. Also, I feel that the expectations for the final were not adequately communicated, leading to a misuse of studying time.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Deepened my understanding of specific points of Latin grammar; helped me gain a new level of awareness about stylistic features in Latin texts; increased my sensitivity as a reader of Latin.
Latin prose composition is a rite of passage for the field, and I am very happy to have received such quality instruction from Professor Solodow.
